name: yd_crypto
description: Some encryption algorithms are organized into a library to provide convenience for low - and medium - end 32 - bit microcontroller encryption and decryption applications.
description_zh: 一些加密算法整理成库，为中低端32位微控制器加解密应用提供便利。
